org.lasarobotics.vision.test.detection

Class ObjectDetection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lasarobotics.vision.test.detection.ObjectDetection

  • public class ObjectDetection
extends java.lang.Object
    Designed to detect a single object at a time in an image

      • analyzeObject

        public ObjectDetection.ObjectAnalysis analyzeObject(org.opencv.core.Mat object)
                                             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Analyzes an object in preparation to search for the object in a frame.

        This method should be called in an initialize() method. Calling the analyzeObject method twice will overwrite the previous objectAnalysis.

        It is recommended to use a GFTT (Good Features To Track) detector for this phase.

        Parameters:
        object - Object image
        Returns:
        The object descriptor matrix to be piped into locateObject() later
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • analyzeScene

        public ObjectDetection.SceneAnalysis analyzeScene(org.opencv.core.Mat scene,
                                         ObjectDetection.ObjectAnalysis analysis)
                                           throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Analyzes a scene for a target object.
        Parameters:
        scene - The scene to be analyzed as a GRAYSCALE matrix
        analysis - The target object's analysis from analyzeObject
        Returns:
        A complete scene analysis
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
